QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_visual_widgets.id odf_pk, odf_visual_widgets.ITEMS_ORDER as items_order, odf_visual_widgets.DIFFERENTIATOR as differentiator, odf_visual_widgets.CODE as code, odf_visual_widgets.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, odf_visual_widgets.COLOR as color, odf_visual_widgets.OWNER_ID as owner_id, odf_visual_widgets.NO_OF_ITEMS as no_of_items, odf_visual_widgets.SORT_ATTRIBUTE_API_ALIAS as sort_attribute, odf_visual_widgets.FILTER_DEF as filter_def, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, odf_visual_widgets.AGGREGATION_TYPE as aggregation_type, odf_visual_widgets.GROUPBY_ATTRIBUTE_API_ALIAS as groupby_attribute, odf_visual_widgets.CHART_TYPE as chart_type, odf_visual_widgets.OBJECT_API_ALIAS as object_api_alias, odf_visual_widgets.ATTRIBUTE_API_ALIAS as attribute_api_alias, odf_visual_widgets.IS_SHARED as is_shared, CAPTIONS.name as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, ODF_VISUAL_WIDGETS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, ODF_VISUAL_WIDGETS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, odf_visual_widgets.NUMBER_FORMAT as number_format , user_context.user_id odf_user_id from odf_visual_widgets odf_visual_widgets inner join (select u.id user_id, u.user_name, u.locale, l.language_code from cmn_sec_users u, cmn_languages l where u.language_id = l.id) user_context on user_context.user_id = user_context.user_id , cmn_captions_nls CAPTIONS, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED where 1 = 1 and CAPTIONS.table_name = 'ODF_VISUAL_WIDGETS' and CAPTIONS.pk_id = odf_visual_widgets.id and CAPTIONS.language_code = user_context.language_code and odf_visual_widgets.created_by = CREATED.user_id and odf_visual_widgets.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id
